seeing as were measuring 2020 months in global crises i thought id share my 2020 in personal crises:

January: pregnant 
February: not pregnant but overdosed on hydrocodone
yeh i kno it! we try not to pull teeth on pregnant women unless it's an emergency but their drs usually say tylenol with codeine, hydrocodone, or oxy! it's crazy lol but with us it's only for 3 days
What doctor prescribes a 34 week pregnant lady hydrocodone for pain?!

A THREAD: All female CPP should read this. My daughter is now almost 15 years old. I was already in pain management when I found out I was pregnant with her. I was on hydrocodone and oxycontin at the time, and my OB/GYN & PMD stayed in continuous contact regarding my care. (1)

I've been watched using the bathroom more than anyone ever should...and not in a rehab setting. While in the Army (once while pregnant) and for a few times in pain management before I decided 2 hydrocodone a day wasn't worth losing what little of my dignity I had left. It's awful

Right. I know for a fact hydrocodone (Vicodin/lortab/norco) is safe during pregnancy for short times, but its rare to get it prescribed. I only know bcuz my friend was pregnant with her 2nd set of twins & she got some from her ob during her 3rd trimester.
Im pregnant so I can't so either, but imo its just like... So youd rather have me on hydrocodone for pain than weed? How does that make sense?
